title: Crash Nebula
description: A humble farmboy makes it his mission to protect the galaxy from the evil that wishes its destruction.
quote: Intergalactic scum, your reign of terror ends now!
altHero: Crash Nebula, space hero, holds up a wrist rocket
alt1: an alien holds up a bendy straw
alt2: three men being held prisoner scream in terror
alt4: Crash Nebula imprisoned while two green aliens plot nearby
